channel.title: Life on Carl Angelo Nievarez
channel.description: Recent content in Life on Carl Angelo Nievarez

item.title: introvert
item.description: I think this is me: I’m an introvert. I’m not shy and I’m not stuck. I’m just listening and observing. I’m very straightforward and you know that. I can’t stand small talks, but if I find something that interest me, I can talk about it for hours. I really, really enjoy my own company, so if I open up to you, it just means that you’re special. So please! Don’t miss that opportunity.

item.title: When I Start To Jump Into Programming?
item.description: Undirected Graphs Some problems Path Shortest path Cycle Ehler tour: A cycle that uses each edge excatly once. Hamilton tour: A cycle that uses each vertex exactly once classical NP-complete problem. Connectivity MST: Biconnectivity: A vertex whose removal disconnects the graph Planarity Graph isomorphism: Are two graphs identical? No one knows so far. A lonstanding open problem Representations Real-world graphs tend to be sparse (huge number of vertices, small average vertex degree).
